Your booking

Michel, congratulations with your booking!

We are looking forward to welcome you at EDMSTERDAM | Music And Fashion.. Please make sure to bring this confirmation for your check in at your hotel, also bring a valid passport or ID card. Please note that the minimum age for EDMSTERDAM | Music And Fashion. is 18 years. You can download your tickets via the link above, please make sure to print them while you need them for your acces to EDMSTERDAM | Music And Fashion..

Shared transfer/Private transfer

If you booked 1 of these options we will contact you 1 week prior the event to discuss details like time etc.

We wish you a great stay, and see you at EDMSTERDAM | Music And Fashion.
